object_name.value: Validate document is associated with a Closed Change Request.

title.value: Used to validate if document is associated with any closed change request document.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
There is an open or approved change request available for this document. Please close/destroy existing change request and perform the action again.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (SELECT r_object_id FROM cd_change_request WHERE any (affected_doc_chronicle_id = '$value(i_chronicle_id)') AND a_status != 'Closed')
